verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto them I am the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֧ה <WH4639> After the doings אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> where יְשַׁבְתֶּם־ <WH3427> wherein ye dwelt בָּ֖הּ לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> shall ye not do וּכְמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> and after the doings אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> of the land כְּנַ֡עַן <WH3667> of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> where אֲנִי֩ <WH589> I am מֵבִ֨יא <WH935> whither I bring אֶתְכֶ֥ם <WH853> שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> in it לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> you shall ye not do וּבְחֻקֹּתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2708> in their ordinances לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> walk

אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֧י <WH4941> my judgments תַּעֲשׂ֛וּ <WH6213> Ye shall do וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֻקֹּתַ֥י <WH2708> mine ordinances תִּשְׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> and keep לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to live בָּהֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> therein I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH8104> Ye shall therefore keep אֶת־ <WH853> חֻקֹּתַי֙ <WH2708> my statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֔י <WH4941> and my judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> do אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> if a man וָחַ֣י <WH2425> he shall live בָּהֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> in them I [am] the LORD ס

אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> to any אִישׁ֙ <WH376> he אֶל־ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> any שְׁאֵ֣ר <WH7607> that is near בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <WH1320> of kin לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִקְרְב֖וּ <WH7126> None of you shall approach לְגַלּ֣וֹת <WH1540> to him to uncover עֶרְוָ֑ה <WH6172> [their] nakedness אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> The nakedness אָבִ֛יךָ <WH1> of thy father וְעֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> or the nakedness אִמְּךָ֖ <WH517> of thy mother לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> shalt thou not uncover אִמְּךָ֣ <WH517> she [is] thy mother הִ֔וא <WH1931> he לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <WH1540> thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <WH6172> her nakedness ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> The nakedness אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> of thy father's לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> shalt thou not uncover עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> nakedness אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> it [is] thy father's הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he ס

עֶרְוַ֨ת <WH6172> The nakedness אֲחֽוֹתְךָ֤ <WH269> of thy sister בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> of thy father א֣וֹ <WH176> or בַת־ <WH1323> or daughter אִמֶּ֔ךָ <WH517> of thy mother מוֹלֶ֣דֶת <WH4138> [whether she be] born בַּ֔יִת <WH1004> at home א֖וֹ <WH176> or מוֹלֶ֣דֶת <WH4138> or born ח֑וּץ <WH2351> abroad לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <WH1540> thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽן׃ <WH6172> [even] their nakedness ס

עֶרְוַ֤ת <WH6172> The nakedness בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter בִּנְךָ֙ <WH1121> of thy son's א֣וֹ <WH176> or בַֽת־ <WH1323> or of thy daughter's בִּתְּךָ֔ <WH1323> daughter לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <WH1540> thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָ֑ן <WH6172> [even] their nakedness כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עֶרְוָתְךָ֖ <WH6172> [is] thine own nakedness הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2007> for theirs ס

עֶרְוַ֨ת <WH6172> The nakedness בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter אֵ֤שֶׁת <WH802> wife's אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> of thy father's מוֹלֶ֣דֶת <WH4138> begotten אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> of thy father אֲחוֹתְךָ֖ <WH269> she [is] thy sister הִ֑וא <WH1931> he לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <WH1540> thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <WH6172> her nakedness ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> the nakedness אֲחוֹת־ <WH269> sister אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> of thy father's לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> Thou shalt not uncover שְׁאֵ֥ר <WH7607> near kinswoman אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> she [is] thy father's הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> the nakedness אֲחֽוֹת־ <WH269> sister אִמְּךָ֖ <WH517> of thy mother's לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> Thou shalt not uncover כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שְׁאֵ֥ר <WH7607> near kinswoman אִמְּךָ֖ <WH517> for she [is] thy mother's הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> the nakedness אֲחִֽי־ <WH251> brother אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> of thy father's לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> Thou shalt not uncover אֶל־ <WH413> about אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <WH802> to his wife לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִקְרָ֔ב <WH7126> thou shalt not approach דֹּדָֽתְךָ֖ <WH1733> she [is] thine aunt הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> the nakedness כַּלָּֽתְךָ֖ <WH3618> of thy daughter in law לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> Thou shalt not uncover אֵ֤שֶׁת <WH802> wife בִּנְךָ֙ <WH1121> she [is] thy son's הִ֔וא <WH1931> he לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <WH1540> thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <WH6172> her nakedness ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> the nakedness אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> of thy brother's לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> Thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> nakedness אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> it [is] thy brother's הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> the nakedness אִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> of a woman וּבִתָּ֖הּ <WH1323> and her daughter לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> Thou shalt not uncover אֶֽת־ <WH853> בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter בְּנָ֞הּ <WH1121> her son's וְאֶת־ <WH853> בַּת־ <WH1323> or her daughter's בִּתָּ֗הּ <WH1323> daughter לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor תִקַּח֙ <WH3947> neither shalt thou take לְגַלּ֣וֹת <WH1540> to uncover עֶרְוָתָ֔הּ <WH6172> her nakedness שַׁאֲרָ֥ה <WH7608> [for] they [are] her near kinswomen הֵ֖נָּה <WH2007> in זִמָּ֥ה <WH2154> it [is] wickedness הִֽוא <WH1931> he

וְאִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> a wife אֶל־ <WH413> addition אֲחֹתָ֖הּ <WH269> to her sister לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִקָּ֑ח <WH3947> Neither shalt thou take לִצְרֹ֗ר <WH6887> to vex לְגַלּ֧וֹת <WH1540> [her] to uncover עֶרְוָתָ֛הּ <WH6172> her nakedness עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> in בְּחַיֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH2416> beside the other in her life

וְאֶל־ <WH413> about אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> unto a woman בְּנִדַּ֣ת <WH5079> as long as she is put apart טֻמְאָתָ֑הּ <WH2932> for her uncleanness לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִקְרַ֔ב <WH7126> Also thou shalt not approach לְגַלּ֖וֹת <WH1540> to uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <WH6172> her nakedness

וְאֶל־ <WH413> about אֵ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH802> wife עֲמִֽיתְךָ֔ <WH5997> with thy neighbour's לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> Moreover thou shalt not שְׁכָבְתְּךָ֖ <WH7903> lie לְזָ֑רַע <WH2233> carnally לְטָמְאָה־ <WH2930> to defile בָֽהּ׃

וּמִֽזַּרְעֲךָ֥ <WH2233> let any of thy seed לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> And thou shalt not לְהַעֲבִ֣יר <WH5674> pass לַמֹּ֑לֶךְ <WH4432> through [the fire] to Molech וְלֹ֧א <WH3808> nor תְחַלֵּ֛ל <WH2490> neither shalt thou profane אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> the name אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> of thy God אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD

וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH854> with זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> with mankind לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִשְׁכַּ֖ב <WH7901> Thou shalt not lie מִשְׁכְּבֵ֣י <WH4904> as with אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> womankind תּוֹעֵבָ֖ה <WH8441> it [is] abomination הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> any בְּהֵמָ֛ה <WH929> with any beast לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> Neither shalt thou שְׁכָבְתְּךָ֖ <WH7903> lie לְטָמְאָה־ <WH2930> to defile בָ֑הּ וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> thyself therewith neither shall any woman לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תַעֲמֹ֞ד <WH5975> stand לִפְנֵ֧י <WH6440> before בְהֵמָ֛ה <WH929> a beast לְרִבְעָ֖הּ <WH7250> to lie down תֶּ֥בֶל <WH8397> thereto it [is] confusion הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽטַּמְּא֖וּ <WH2930> Defile בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> not ye yourselves in any of these things כִּ֤י <WH3588> by בְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> things נִטְמְא֣וּ <WH2930> are defiled הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> for in all these the nations אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <WH7971> which I cast out מִפְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

וַתִּטְמָ֣א <WH2930> is defiled הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> And the land וָאֶפְקֹ֥ד <WH6485> therefore I do visit עֲוֹנָ֖הּ <WH5771> the iniquity עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> and וַתָּקִ֥א <WH6958> itself vomiteth out הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> thereof upon it and the land אֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3427> her inhabitants

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH8104> Ye shall therefore keep אַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> you אֶת־ <WH853> חֻקֹּתַי֙ <WH2708> my statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֔י <WH4941> and my judgments וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and shall not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> and shall not commit מִכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all manner הַתּוֹעֵבֹ֖ת <WH8441> [any] of these abominations הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> of these הָֽאֶזְרָ֔ח <WH249> [neither] any of your own nation וְהַגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> nor any stranger הַגָּ֥ר <WH1481> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכְכֶֽם׃ <WH8432> among

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַתּוֹעֵבֹ֣ת <WH8441> abominations הָאֵ֔ל <WH411> (For all these עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> done אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH376> the men הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> which [were] before וַתִּטְמָ֖א <WH2930> is defiled הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> you and the land

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תָקִ֤יא <WH6958> spue not you out הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> That the land אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> בְּטַֽמַּאֲכֶ֖ם <WH2930> also when ye defile אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which קָאָ֛ה <WH6958> it as it spued out אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּ֖וֹי <WH1471> the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לִפְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> that [were] before

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> For whosoever shall commit מִכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all manner הַתּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <WH8441> any of these abominations הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> of these וְנִכְרְת֛וּ <WH3772> [them] shall be cut off הַנְּפָשׁ֥וֹת <WH5315> even the souls הָעֹשֹׂ֖ת <WH6213> that commit מִקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> from among עַמָּֽם׃ <WH5971> their people

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH8104> Therefore shall ye keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֗י <WH4931> mine ordinance לְבִלְתִּ֨י <WH1115> not עֲשׂ֜וֹת <WH6213> that [ye] commit מֵחֻקּ֤וֹת <WH2708> customs הַתּֽוֹעֵבֹת֙ <WH8441> not [any one] of these abominable אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נַעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> which were committed לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> before וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִֽטַּמְּא֖וּ <WH2930> you and that ye defile בָּהֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> not yourselves therein I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God פ
